name: Square Off (Shiba Dog Studios)
description:
Square Off is a fast-paced, platforming shooter arena. Control physics-based battle squares in a series of speedy combat challenges while you shoot your friends into oblivion.

Play with 2-4 players on local multiplayer ( Further updates due for online support)

Controls:

Controller Supported Only

Move - Left Stick

Jump / Start - X / A

Shoot - (While in air) aim with Left Stick and fire with Right Trigger

Gameplay:

The last player standing wins the round, first player to win 5 rounds wins the game!
